question:
Question: Navigation Instruction given at initial position: [turning left and going straight to the buildings and slight right turn. coming near the lake and turning right and going up to the building. coming down to the building and again going up and going straight. going top of the building and turning left and coming down to the building. roaming around a tower and searching each floor of apartment.]. At the initial position, you are asked to navigate according to a series of movement instructions. What Landmark Position are you oriented to the waterfront when you arrive at your current location?  
choose:  
A. I am on the waterfront.  
B. I am far away from the seaside.  
C. I am located above the waterfront.  
D. I am located below the seashore.  
E. I am located on the left side of the waterfront.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: C; Reason: The sequence of images shows that the agent navigates through a series of buildings and eventually reaches a high vantage point overlooking the waterfront. This indicates that the agent is located above the waterfront when arriving at the current location.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0, 15), (24, 48), (50, 60), (119, 130)]
Option: C
Reason: From the beginning of the video, the agent is on top of a building. From 0:24 to 0:48, the agent is on top of a building and the waterfront is visible in the distance. From 0:50 to 1:10, the agent is still on top of a building and the waterfront is visible. From 1:19 to 1:30, the agent is on top of a building and the waterfront is visible. Therefore, the agent is located above the waterfront.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: C; Reason: The sequence of images shows that the agent navigates through a series of buildings and eventually reaches a high vantage point overlooking the waterfront. This indicates that the agent is located above the waterfront when arriving at the current location.
